document.full_text: before their loss to the dodgers, the mets put pitcher chris young on the 15-day disabled list because of tightness in the back of his throwing shoulder.
document.title: dodgers 4, mets 2: young put on d.l.; offense can't pick up slack
lines_and_colors: before their loss to the dodgers, the mets put pitcher chris young on the 15-day disabled list because of tightness in the back of his throwing shoulder.
